name: Aurora Pilot
description:
Press ESC if you want to regain control over your mouse. Press TAB to access menu. Controls:  On Foot:
- WSAD to MOVE
- LEFT mouse button to FLY Flying:
- W and S to TURN the plane DOWN and UP
- A and D to ROLL the plane LEFT and RIGHT
- Q an E to TURN theq plane LEFT and RIGHT
- Right Mouse button to SLOW TIME for FUN! This game was made in 7 days for the ZenoJam 2022 gamejam Thank you for visiting me here!

Aurora Pilot is a dreamlike, relaxing flying "simulator". The goal is to just enjoy flying!

I have aimed to make the game as "Zen" as possible, therefore the focus is on just flying and enjoying the scenery. Please let me know If you liked it and would like me to develop it further!

Genre: Relaxing/flying/simulation

Tips:

Tips:

- You can reverse controls in menu
- Collect fuel to FLY
- Fly over fire for a SPEED BOOST
- Don't go too far or your engine will stop
- Start the game in Zen Mode if you don't like fuel mechanics
- Have fun!
- Please leave me a feedback!
